Load_Control.label: Load Control
Load_Control.description: This Object is used for demand-response load control and other load control in automation application (not limited to power).

Event_Identifier.label: Event Identifier
Event_Identifier.description: The event identifier as a string.

Duration_In_Min.label: Duration In Min
Duration_In_Min.description: The duration of the event in minutes.

Criticality_Level.label: Criticality Level
Criticality_Level.description: The criticality of the event. The device receiving the event will react in an appropriate fashion for the device.

Avg_Load_AdjPct.label: Avg Load AdjPct
Avg_Load_AdjPct.description: Defines the maximum energy usage of the receiving device, as a percentage of the device's normal maximum energy usage.

Duty_Cycle.label: Duty Cycle
Duty_Cycle.description: Defines the duty cycle for the load control event, i.e, what percentage of time the receiving device is allowed to be on.

Application_Type.label: Application Type
Application_Type.description: The application type of the sensor or actuator as a string depending on the use case.

Timestamp.label: Timestamp
Timestamp.description: The timestamp of when the measurement was performed.

Fractional_Timestamp.label: Fractional Timestamp
Fractional_Timestamp.description: Fractional part of the timestamp when sub-second precision is used (e.g., 0.23 for 230 ms).
